message: Let's make a deal. Take this generous offer while it still holds its value!
My turn! How about a more even split this time?
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a better offer than the last one. Don't miss out!
It seems we both value a fair share. How about we meet in the middle with this offer?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offers are very fair considering the time pressure. Let's wrap this up!
Alice, let's be realistic. This is my final offer before I have to significantly lower my expectations.
